Question.Subject: How to do an eBay search by distance only ?
Question.Content: I am trying to do an Ebay search for any item near me. It takes a long time to look at each category for items in a small zip range. I know eBay does not like wild card searches, but I am just looking for a good deal. I don't care what it is only where it is.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
That's a hard one for me. I went tp the main eBay page, and clicked on advanced search. It took me to the page where you can search just about any way you want. I picked a category (DVD), and told it to only search within 100 miles of my zip code.
It pulled up searches that were nowhere near where I live. You can always ask on Live Help, with this link. They should be able to help you better than I can: http://pages.ebay.com/help/basics/n-livehelpemail.html
That's honestly the most help I can offer.
Good luck!
